titles.title: Neutral Cost Recovery Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the deduction for depreciation shall be computed on a neutral cost recovery basis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/18/2003--Introduced. Neutral Cost Recovery Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require that the depreciation deduction for tangible property placed in service after 2003 be computed using neutral cost recovery ratios.
